channel.title: Stop with custom stuff!
channel.description:
Stop posting your custom interfaces, emotes, or GFX's.
We have the meaning 317 because we use to not have custom weapons and armor, and we didn't have custom emotes.
By adding custom items and emotes and GFX'S to your client, your taking up space. Clients that are without custom interfaces, custom items and emotes can be as little as 15MB.
I see clients now that are 30MB-60MB.
If you truely want d claws then make a 525+
If you want godwars then use a 474+...
This is becoming just BS how people keep addin g useless junk to their server. People call it "keeping up to date", yet turning the good old days into runescape 2008 is just dumb.
I know Lin posted about this a little while ago with the interface problem, but this is getting way to out of hand. Do you really think your players like downloading 40MB+ files every time you add a new item or emote? I sure wouldn't.
So please...Stop wqith the damn custom stuff, it's becom ing to much of a problem. Save your clients usage and player happiness.

item.title: Stop with custom stuff!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

This thread is pointless, and as you can see it has kicked up a lot of flame/spam.

Read full topic

item.title: Stop with custom stuff!
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“MrPotatoHead, post:19, topic:322556”]MrPotatoHead says… STFU !!! What the fuck do you think client hacking is?
Clients with no custom stuff is like what exactly? it’s like runescape, if you don’t want custom stuff, fuck off and go play runescape.

I got a new point emote for christmas, OMG no fingers.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Stop with custom stuff!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I don’t see how.

It just adds a little “Spice” to your server.
Making it unique, and making the bridge from old runescape even longer.

Most do it just for something different, and especially if they designed that custom. It’s question awesome to see a piece of your own work in a game.

Read full topic

item.title: Stop with custom stuff!
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

personally most godwars+ custom’s are fail, but there is no way in heck im going to leave my client unedited sorry, also d claws and stuff are stupid, but people like them because they look cool and they are too poor to get or even borrow in rs.

also, in my opinion the less it looks like any rs revision the higher my chances of avoiding jagex.

Read full topic

item.title: Stop with custom stuff!
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

I can see were your going with this John…

People still use customs because they are to blind to see it takes up room in the client. I still use custom items but no recolors or d calws. Those just ruin the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Stop with custom stuff!
item.dc:creator: @Tomkruz Tomkruz
item.description:

I agree, there’s practically no need to edit the client besides changing the IP.

item.title: Stop with custom stuff!
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“licorish55, post:1, topic:322569”]What the fuck?

You can’t JUST add it to your cache.

That doesn’t even make sense?[/quote]

Yes you can.
You can upload it straight to the cache.

Anyhow. Some servers like “Old School Remake” are EXACTLY like a 317.

Others try and revolutionize the 317 and add customs, anims, ect.

Read full topic

item.title: Stop with custom stuff!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Espeon, post:9, topic:322556”][quote author=r r r link=topic=418950.msg3078704#msg3078704 date=1262022989]

There’s nothing wrong with custom’s in a client as long as there in the cache.

You obviously read the first sentence and tryed to act smart.
What you just posted rrr makes absol-fucking-lutely no sense to this.

Lol because adding stuff to the cache is better than in the client asshole.

I’m pretty sure you just got done saying it’s better to add in the cache than in the client.
???

Yes custom are fine if they are in the cache. All custom items can be pack to obj.dat and obj.idx, those can be replaced in the cache with tom’s suite then you will have all you item’s without the ints in Class8. Understand?
[/quote]

Agreed.

If someone doesn’t have the knowledge to do that, they can also update to a higher cache such as 377.[/quote]

Heh, your dont realise then that most 317 clients already load the 377 cache. Unless Falador north gate has “Wood” towers on it, then its the 377 cache.

Read full topic

item.title: Stop with custom stuff!

Lol because adding stuff to the cache is better than in the client asshole.

I’m pretty sure you just got done saying it’s better to add in the cache than in the client.
???
[/quote]
Yes custom are fine if they are in the cache. All custom items can be pack to obj.dat and obj.idx, those can be replaced in the cache with tom’s suite then you will have all you item’s without the ints in Class8. Understand?[/quote]

Agreed.

If someone doesn’t have the knowledge to do that, they can also update to a higher cache such as 377.

Read full topic

[quote=“licorish55, post:1, topic:322569”]What the fuck?

You can’t JUST add it to your cache.

That doesn’t even make sense?[/quote]
You can’t, but it is possible to pack stuff into the cache.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2009, 12:56:29 pm[/size][hr][quote=“licorish55”][quote author=r r r link=topic=418950.msg3078670#msg3078670 date=1262022397]

There’s nothing wrong with custom’s in a client as long as there in the cache.

Lol because adding stuff to the cache is better than in the client asshole.
[/quote]

I’m pretty sure you just got done saying it’s better to add in the cache than in the client.
???[/quote]
Yes custom are fine if they are in the cache. All custom items can be pack to obj.dat and obj.idx, those can be replaced in the cache with tom’s suite then you will have all you item’s without the ints in Class8. Understand?

Read full topic

item.title: Stop with custom stuff!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Kid, just go, you dont realise that some people dont want to make 525’s because simply it is not the WL setup. When someone makes a WL setup into a 525 then yes, more people will make it, but until then, no, they will keep updating there clients as they please. What you dont realise is the more customised the client is so the game-play is away from RS, the less they can go after us on.

Read full topic

By adding custom items and emotes and GFX’S to your client, your taking up space. Clients that are without custom interfaces, custom items and emotes can be as little as 15MB.

I see clients now that are 30MB-60MB.

If you truely want d claws then make a 525+
